page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: THE FOLLOWING IS A RECORD OF A TYPICAL DAY DURING A SCHOOL HOLIDAY. 0945- I WAKE UP FEELING DROWSY. 0955- I GET OUT OF BED. 1000- I MAKE BREAKFAST OF CORNFLAKES. 1025- WATCH TV CHILDRENS PROGRAMMES. 1050- LISTEN TO MY PERSONAL STEREO. 1150- HELP TO PREPARE DINNER. 1245- EAT DINNER (SAUSAGE AND CHIPS). 1320- GO TO THE PARK-PLAY ON SWINGS. 1430- RETURN FROM PARK. 1440- GO TO SEE GRANDPARENTS IN SKEWEN 1600- WATCH B.B.C. CHILDREN'S PROGRAMS 1700- HAVE TEA-BAKED BEANS ON TOAST. 1730- GO HOME FROM SKEWEN. 1800- PLAY WITH THE CAT. 1850- GO BACK TO THE PARK. 2000- GO BACK HOME. 2030- GO TO BED.
